p: Drug resistance selection studies showed that subtype C selected the K65R mutation faster under TFV pressure compared to subtype B [ 35]. However, K65R may be less frequent in subtype A than in all other subtypes [ 43]. A higher propensity to acquire TAMs was reported in patients carrying CRF_06 (AGK recombinants) as compared to patients carrying CRF02_AG from Burkina Faso [ 44].
